SpellCardsRule.NAME: Spell Card Rule Manual
SpellCardsRule.FLAVOR: A mysterious power keeps Spell Card Rule's work.
DESCRIPTIONS: With this, you can use the #ySpell #yCard #yRule. Right click to get a SP card. (Every turn limit #b1).
I don't have enough P point.
I had got the SP card.

KomeijisEye.NAME: Satori's Eye
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, you will gain buff according to enemy's #bIntents. (It will be of no effect at the first turn).

Grimoire.NAME: Grimoire
Grimoire.FLAVOR: A precious book that fills you up with magic power.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b1 Orb slot.

MigarariNingyou.NAME: Sacrificial Doll
MigarariNingyou.FLAVOR: The damage taken by the possessor will be partially taken by this gratitude evoking doll.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, get #b1 #yShield #yDoll.

SteinsOfFate.NAME: Gem of Fate
SteinsOfFate.FLAVOR: This scarlet gem produce an effect on your fate somehow...
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw an extra card at the start of your turn. When each enemy die,gain #1 count. right click to cost #1 count to draw #b1 card.

ThirstyCross.NAME: Thirsty Cross
ThirstyCross.FLAVOR: You can't rid it. Whether itself, or the thirst it brings,the thirst of blood...
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b2 #yStrength . If you didn't use any #yAttack in #b1 turn, lose #b3 HP at turn's end.

ReiryokuShyu.NAME: Spirit Orb
ReiryokuShyu.FLAVOR: When you glow with energy, this gem will radiate softly.
DESCRIPTIONS: At start of your turn, if you have at least  #b4 #rP point, gain [R] .

SpellExtend.NAME: Spell Card Extend
SpellExtend.FLAVOR: This SP card will suddenly appear in Spell Card Rule Manual,and become can be use...
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have at least #b2 #rP point,you can choose from #b5 cards when choose SP card.

ShirouKen.NAME: Hakurou Sword
ShirouKen.FLAVOR: A sword cast by mystic apparition, which can chop off maze.
DESCRIPTIONS: In #1 turn, each #yAttack you used will make after #yAttacks' damage grows #1 .

LinkosWocchi.NAME: Reverse Watch
LinkosWocchi.FLAVOR: There is several words on its back: As long as you keep pushing beyond yourself, there will be light in the front.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click it in your turn, will make every unit's HP back to last turn, it is of no effect to dead or Minion.(Every combat limit #b1 time)

KyoryuNoHagoromo.NAME: Divine Raiment of the Dragon Fish
KyoryuNoHagoromo.FLAVOR: A wind and lightning bolt repelling raiment of dragon fish.

KoishisEye.NAME: Closed Satori's Eye
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b2 #yStrength and #yDexterity . You can no longer see enemy #bIntents and ALL units' status.

JyouHari.NAME: Cleansed Crystal Mirror
JyouHari.FLAVOR: By looking into the mirror, they see all your past deeds.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, enemy will gain debuff according to its #bIntents .

WordlessDocument.NAME: Wordless Document
WordlessDocument.FLAVOR: There is no word on it,but a signet with: the Ministry of Right and Wrong...
DESCRIPTIONS: You can feel something peculiar with it,but you can't say what it is...

CrystalBall.NAME: Crystal Ball
CrystalBall.FLAVOR: By pour mana into this,you can make element magic work easily.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click to choose #b1 #yElement #yOrb to gain (Except Luna and Sun).Every turn limit #1 time.

FamiliarSpoon.NAME: Familiar Spoon
DESCRIPTIONS: When you stare at this spoon, there is someone emerge in your mind...

BookofPenglai.NAME: Mysterious Book
BookofPenglai.FLAVOR: There is no word on its cover...
DESCRIPTIONS: #yPermanent Right click to browse this book...
The remaining pages are all blank...
The anxious paradise will open the gate.'
There write in blood: NL Hexa Ghost
There write in blood: NL Slime Boss
There write in blood: NL The Guardian
There write in blood: NL Bronze Automaton
There write in blood: NL Champ
There write in blood: NL The Collector
There write in blood: NL Awakened One
There write in blood: NL Time Eater
It says:This no longer has practical effect,keep it only as a souvenir.
Right click to browse this book...

NitorisBag.NAME: General Service Bag
NitorisBag.FLAVOR: There are various items in the bag,you can assemble them optionally.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click to create #b1 card and add to your draw pile.(Every combat limit #b1 time)
Deal 6 Static damage to a random enemy.
Deal 5 Static damage to ALL enemies.
Apply 3 Weak to a random enemy.
Apply 3 Vulnerable to a random enemy.
Deal 12 Static damage to a random enemy.
Deal 10 Static damage to ALL enemies.
Apply 3 Weak and Vulnerable to a random enemy.
Deal 18 Static damage to a random enemy.
Deal 15 Static damage to ALL enemies.
Apply 3 Weak, Vulnerable and Frail to ALL enemies.

MysticStaff.NAME: Staff
MysticStaff.FLAVOR: Formidable magician can conjure without tool. But to those new magicians, they can only ues senior magic with a staff.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click to add #b1 Spell Card to your hand. This card base on #b2 next #yElement orb.(Every turn limit #b1 time)
I don't have enough Element orb.

ColorfulQuillpen.NAME: Colorful Quill-pen
ColorfulQuillpen.FLAVOR: This miraculous quill-pen can overwrite the Manual partly...
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click to refresh the Spell Card you can choose.(Every combat limit #b1 time)
I don't need to use it now.

RingOfDollmaker.NAME: Ring of Dollmaker
RingOfDollmaker.FLAVOR: It's almost a essential tool to Dollmakers. Even a Dollmaker attained perfection in skill, he still will use it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click to fill your slot with #yDoll. At most #3.(Every combat limit #b1 time)
